Public Class ShortFormDictionaryValidationStrategy(Of TKey, TValue) Implements IValidationStrategy
generic <typename TKey, typename TValue> public ref class ShortFormDictionaryValidationStrategy : Microsoft::AspNetCore::Mvc::ModelBinding::Validation::IValidationStrategy

template <typename TKey, typename TValue> [Windows::Foundation::Metadata::WebHostHidden] class ShortFormDictionaryValidationStrategy : Microsoft::AspNetCore::Mvc::ModelBinding::Validation::IValidationStrategy

Docs.typeparam: The of the keys of the model dictionary.
The of the values of the model dictionary.
Docs.summary: An implementation of for a dictionary bound with 'short form' style keys.
Docs.remarks:
This implementation handles cases like:
Model: IDictionary<string, Student> Query String: ?students[Joey].Age=8&students[Katherine].Age=9
In this case, 'Joey' and 'Katherine' are the keys of the dictionary, used to bind two 'Student' objects. The enumerator returned from this class will yield two 'Student' objects with corresponding keys 'students[Joey]' and 'students[Katherine]'
Using this key format, the enumerator enumerates model objects of type . The keys of the dictionary are not validated as they must be simple types.
